evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability and reliability.
CCS is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring that they protect health information accordingly.
The CCS API supports FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare applications.
Integration with EHR systems follows HL7 protocols for data exchange.
The company leverages Azure for data management and secure storage solutions in their health tech products.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in API-driven healthcare data exchange, fits size and tech stack.
